1: לְדָוִ֗ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>[A Psalm] of David</n> בְּשַׁנּוֹת֣וֹ <sup>8138 </sup> <n>when he changed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> טַ֭עְמוֹ <sup>2940 </sup> <n>his behaviour</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> אֲבִימֶ֑לֶךְ <sup>40 </sup> <n>Abimelech</n> וַֽ֝יְגָרֲשֵׁ֗הוּ <sup>1644 </sup> <n>who drove him away</n> וַיֵּלַֽךְ׃ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>along</n> אֲבָרֲכָ֣ה <sup>1288 </sup> <n>I will bless</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עֵ֑ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>at all times</n> תָּ֝מִ֗יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>[shall] continually</n> תְּֽהִלָּת֥וֹ <sup>8416 </sup> <n>his praise</n> בְּפִֽי׃ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>[be] in my mouth</n>
2: בַּ֭יהוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>in the LORD</n> תִּתְהַלֵּ֣ל <sup>1984 </sup> <n>shall make her boast</n> נַפְשִׁ֑י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>My soul</n> יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>shall hear</n> עֲנָוִ֣ים <sup>6035 </sup> <n>the humble</n> וְיִשְׂמָֽחוּ׃ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>[thereof] and be glad</n>
3: גַּדְּל֣וּ <sup>1431 </sup> <n>O magnify</n> לַיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אִתִּ֑י <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> וּנְרוֹמְמָ֖ה <sup>7311 </sup> <n>with me and let us exalt</n> שְׁמ֣וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> יַחְדָּֽו׃ <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n>
4: דָּרַ֣שְׁתִּי <sup>1875 </sup> <n>I sought</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְעָנָ֑נִי <sup>6030 </sup> <n>and he heard</n> וּמִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מְ֝גוּרוֹתַ֗י <sup>4035 </sup> <n>me from all my fears</n> הִצִּילָֽנִי׃ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>me and delivered</n>
5: הִבִּ֣יטוּ <sup>5027 </sup> <n>They looked</n> אֵלָ֣יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> וְנָהָ֑רוּ <sup>5102 </sup> <n>unto him and were lightened</n> וּ֝פְנֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>and their faces</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>will never</n> יֶחְפָּֽרוּ׃ <sup>2659 </sup> <n>were not ashamed</n>
6: זֶ֤ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> עָנִ֣י <sup>6041 </sup> <n>This poor man</n> קָ֭רָא <sup>7121 </sup> <n>cried</n> וַיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> שָׁמֵ֑עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> וּמִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> צָ֝רוֹתָ֗יו <sup>6869 </sup> <n>him out of all his troubles</n> הוֹשִׁיעֽוֹ׃ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>[him] and saved</n>
7: חֹנֶ֤ה <sup>2583 </sup> <n>encampeth</n> מַלְאַךְ־ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>The angel</n> יְהוָ֓ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> סָ֘בִ֤יב <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> לִֽירֵאָ֗יו <sup>3373 </sup> <n>them that fear</n> וַֽיְחַלְּצֵֽם׃ <sup>2502 </sup> <n>him and delivereth</n>
8: טַעֲמ֣וּ <sup>2938 </sup> <n>O taste</n> וּ֭רְאוּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and see</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ט֣וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[is] good</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that the LORD</n> אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י <sup>835 </sup> <n>blessed</n> הַ֝גֶּ֗בֶר <sup>1397 </sup> <n>[is] the man</n> יֶחֱסֶה־ <sup>2620 </sup> <n>[that] trusteth</n> בּֽוֹ׃
9: יְר֣אוּ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>O fear</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> קְדֹשָׁ֑יו <sup>6918 </sup> <n>ye his saints</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> מַ֝חְס֗וֹר <sup>4270 </sup> <n>for [there is] no want</n> לִירֵאָֽיו׃ <sup>3373 </sup> <n>to them that fear</n>
10: כְּ֭פִירִים <sup>3715 </sup> <n>The young lions</n> רָשׁ֣וּ <sup>7326 </sup> <n>do lack</n> וְרָעֵ֑בוּ <sup>7456 </sup> <n>and suffer hunger</n> וְדֹרְשֵׁ֥י <sup>1875 </sup> <n>but they that seek</n> יְ֝הוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not be in</n> יַחְסְר֥וּ <sup>2637 </sup> <n>shall not want</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of any</n> טֽוֹב׃ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>any good</n>
11: לְֽכוּ־ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Come</n> בָ֭נִים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>ye children</n> שִׁמְעוּ־ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hearken</n> לִ֑י יִֽרְאַ֥ת <sup>3374 </sup> <n>you the fear</n> יְ֝הוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֲלַמֶּדְכֶֽם׃ <sup>3925 </sup> <n>unto me I will teach</n>
12: מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> הָ֭אִישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>What man</n> הֶחָפֵ֣ץ <sup>2655 </sup> <n>[is he that] desireth</n> חַיִּ֑ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>life</n> אֹהֵ֥ב <sup>157 </sup> <n>[and] loveth</n> יָ֝מִ֗ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[many] days</n> לִרְא֥וֹת <sup>7200 </sup> <n>that he may see</n> טֽוֹב׃ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>good</n>
13: נְצֹ֣ר <sup>5341 </sup> <n>Keep</n> לְשׁוֹנְךָ֣ <sup>3956 </sup> <n>thy tongue</n> מֵרָ֑ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>from evil</n> וּ֝שְׂפָתֶ֗יךָ <sup>8193 </sup> <n>and thy lips</n> מִדַּבֵּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>from speaking</n> מִרְמָֽה׃ <sup>4820 </sup> <n>guile</n>
14: ס֣וּר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>Depart</n> מֵ֭רָע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>from evil</n> וַעֲשֵׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n> ט֑וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>good</n> בַּקֵּ֖שׁ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>seek</n> שָׁל֣וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peace</n> וְרָדְפֵֽהוּ׃ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>and pursue</n>
15: עֵינֵ֣י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>The eyes</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>are toward</n> צַדִּיקִ֑ים <sup>6662 </sup> <n>[are] upon the righteous</n> וְ֝אָזְנָ֗יו <sup>241 </sup> <n>and his ears</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>are toward</n> שַׁוְעָתָֽם׃ <sup>7775 </sup> <n>[are open] unto their cry</n>
16: פְּנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>The face</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> בְּעֹ֣שֵׂי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[is] against them that do</n> רָ֑ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> לְהַכְרִ֖ית <sup>3772 </sup> <n>to cut off</n> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of them from the earth</n> זִכְרָֽם׃ <sup>2143 </sup> <n>the remembrance</n>
17: צָעֲק֣וּ <sup>6817 </sup> <n>[The righteous] cry</n> וַיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> שָׁמֵ֑עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heareth</n> וּמִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> צָ֝רוֹתָ֗ם <sup>6869 </sup> <n>them out of all their troubles</n> הִצִּילָֽם׃ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>and delivereth</n>
18: קָר֣וֹב <sup>7138 </sup> <n>[is] nigh</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> לְנִשְׁבְּרֵי־ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>unto them that are of a broken</n> לֵ֑ב <sup>3820 </sup> <n>heart</n> וְֽאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דַּכְּאֵי־ <sup>1793 </sup> <n>such as be of a contrite</n> ר֥וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>spirit</n> יוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>and saveth</n>
19: רַ֭בּוֹת <sup>7227 </sup> <n>Many</n> רָע֣וֹת <sup>7451 </sup> <n>[are] the afflictions</n> צַדִּ֑יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>of the righteous</n> וּ֝מִכֻּלָּ֗ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יַצִּילֶ֥נּוּ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>delivereth</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>but the LORD</n>
20: שֹׁמֵ֥ר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>He keepeth</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עַצְמוֹתָ֑יו <sup>6106 </sup> <n>all his bones</n> אַחַ֥ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>not one</n> מֵ֝הֵ֗נָּה <sup>2007 </sup> <n>of them</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> נִשְׁבָּֽרָה׃ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>is broken</n>
21: תְּמוֹתֵ֣ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall slay</n> רָשָׁ֣ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>the wicked</n> רָעָ֑ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>Evil</n> וְשֹׂנְאֵ֖י <sup>8130 </sup> <n>and they that hate</n> צַדִּ֣יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>the righteous</n> יֶאְשָֽׁמוּ׃ <sup>816 </sup> <n>shall be desolate</n>
22: פּוֹדֶ֣ה <sup>6299 </sup> <n>redeemeth</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> נֶ֣פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>the soul</n> עֲבָדָ֑יו <sup>5650 </sup> <n>of his servants</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יֶ֝אְשְׁמ֗וּ <sup>816 </sup> <n>in him shall be desolate</n> כָּֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>who</n> הַחֹסִ֥ים <sup>2620 </sup> <n>and none of them that trust</n> בּֽוֹ׃
